analysis_history.title: Analysis History
analysis_history.description: A record of a security analysis performed by an AI agent.

agent.description: The name of the agent that performed the analysis.

result.description: The verdict of the analysis (e.g., Safe, Suspicious, Malicious).

summary.description: A brief summary of the findings.

advice.description: The recommended action for the user.

createdAt.description: The timestamp when the analysis was created.

/analysis_history/{historyId}.description: Stores the history of all security analysis events.
